User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/534.30 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/12.0.742.112 Safari/534.30

Steps to reproduce:

In the Folder list, you can set a Folder as a Favorite...



Expected results:

...Tags should be allowed to be applied to folders, with the folders matching the tag color, and all messages in that folder showing up on searches for that tag.  Also the user should be allowed to define colors to use for each tag (unread messages, new messages, and no new/unread messages...  Which are currently black bolded, blue bolded, and black unbolded... )
